website_summaries.verdict: Created as a tailgate table, this outdoor table folds to a great size to throw in the back of your vehicle and hit the road.
pros: Rectangular shape makes for a convenient table
Has a nicely functional carrying handle to aid with portability
Perfect for serving a buffet of food on a picnic or tailgate
cons: While this table has adjustable height, it isn't easy to change the height on the legs

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive description!!!! Top is pressed paperboard.
customer_reviews.text: Description is deceptive!!! The description states a "resin top." NONSENSE!! The top is paperboard covered with a thin layer of black "contact paper." I bought this for camping. The first time moisture gets to it it is bound to start sagging and falling apart. Requested a return of the item right after opening the package. I would never use this outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Pisko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Inexpensive Treadmill Walking Desk Solution!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive treadmill walking desk and was inspired by someone on pintrest. This table works very well. I purchased four 5 ft 1" PVC pipes, cut to suit (mine was 41" in length) and slipped them over the folding legs of the table. I also added the PVC end caps so the total was about $12 in materials + the cost of the table. FYI, I used electrical tape to wrap the table legs near the top to shim the PVC pipes so they won't slide off when removing the table from my treadmill. I hope this is helpful as I had a hard time finding suggestions or solutions online!!!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Good for 2 years, then leg collapsed.
customer_reviews.text: After two years of light use, a leg collapsed, and now won't lock into place. Fortunately, it was only papers and a few books that toppled over, and not a birthday cake. A warning label on bottom of table says if you try to close a leg without first depressing the locking piece, it will permanently damage the leg. I'm sure we didn't do that, since we collapse and open the table every few weeks, and know how to do it (the legs won't move unless you do it right), so there must be some issue with delicacy of the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Bakdc

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Tables were rusty right out of the package. One table top was not connected to the frame. I am very disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good basic table
customer_reviews.text: Depending on your needs, this is a very good table for light duties, like writing, eating a meal or using a laptop. Just don't put too many heavy weight objects on it. Despite the 100 lbs max weight capacity stated by the manufacturer, I wouldn't put more than a couple of textbooks esp. near or in the center (put them near the edges where there's more support.) Underneath the resin top is cardboard which will probably deteriorate over time esp. in humid environments. I'm using it for a guest bedroom so it'll serve its purpose well. Avoid the vinyl top version as it may peel over time.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this I was expecting a solid table with heavy duty legs. This is a glorified folding table. It’s super lightweight. It feels unstable and the this thing wobbles. This thing feels cheap even at the price I paid. Find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Unfiltered N

customer_reviews.title: so I was not expecting great quality but what I received was a table with ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this item a (-) star review I would, because quite honestly it doesn't deserve a 1 star. It's a very inexpensive item for sure, so I was not expecting great quality but what I received was a table with the rods bent and the screws pushing through the vinyl. I have no time to return it and must have something to use for tomorrow but even taking into account the minimal price, the quality is not acceptable by any standards. I, obviously, will NOT purchase again, and would suggest using a plank of wood placed over concrete blocks before buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Shoddy Construction
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I guess it's not bad. But this is terrible quality. I worry about how long it will last. PVC is involved...as a top layer connected to some fibreboard. It's held together with staples, rivets, and cheap angle brackets. It's warped. It wobbles. I worry about putting my DJ gear on this table...the description says it will hold the weight, but my first impression is not reassuring.
customer_reviews.author: ATP

customer_reviews.title: Best buy all year
customer_reviews.text: Super strong, not like a regular card table, it's a bit heavier than that. Folds down quickly. Height adjustment is easy and makes it suitable for a lot of different uses. Short enough to use as a desk from a recliner--or to use a dinner table if you need to. This is probably the best purchase I made all year--superior value to price ratio.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and spend the cash on a Lifetime folding table. Mine has lasted years and is solid plastic. I ordered 3 of these and the build quality is junk. Paper-board covered by plastic. Flimsy legs and weal folding mechanism. Not worth the $25.00.
customer_reviews.author: HowzitUSA

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: This is a really sturdy table. Nice black top, plenty roomy to hold a complete bar for a party. The only thing I had some trouble with was extending the table to the taller height. In order to move the legs to the higher height , you have to press in both knobs on the legs, and with only "two arms", I had to use my head to push the bar up to lock the new height/legs in place. Other than that, it's a great table at a great price. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The table seems sturdy. I am using it as a platform against the window with stairs leading up to it for my 30lb dog that loves to look out the window. I added egg-crate padding, blankets and pillows.... yeah.. he is spoiled. It holds his weight very easily. Unfortunately it does not fold in half for easy storage and the legs are not height adjustable but the description is accurate so I knew it would fit fine. Overall for the price the table was exactly what I was looking for and I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Glorified Carboard
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty bad. If it gets wet at all its going to serious issues. Very cheaply made. Mine lasted 3 weekend camping trips before it started to bend and bow. Can't handle much weight but \the worst thing is it says Resin which is misleading because it is hard cardboard with a thin resin coating. If it was 9 dollars maybe worth it but there are much better tables (solid hard tops) out there for the same price. I would love to get a refund or a replacement
customer_reviews.author: T.B

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable table
customer_reviews.text: This is the second COSCO resin top table I have purchased from Amazon. I used the first table I purchased, off and on, in my dinning room, when not in use easily folds away. After a few years gave that one to my daughter and she uses it all the time at her house in the dinning room and family room. I purchased a second COSCO resin top table for my home office (I use it like a credenza) while working from home during the covid-19 lockdown. Its perfect for holding boxes of files and office supplies. Very sturdy, you can move it wherever you need it, and folds flat when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable height table
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered a week EARLY :) Table is easy to open & really sturdy. It will be a great addition to my small desk for teaching virtually. It's nice because I can even sit under this table. When virtual learning is over, I can fold this table up & put it away. Only disappointment is that I thought the height could be adjusted in between the given heights. This table can only be 1 of 2 heights. I'm keeping the table, but will add a riser to each foot to match the height of my desk. The higher height would be great if I wanted to work standing
customer_reviews.author: Lori M

customer_reviews.title: I am using this lightweight table as a desk for my kids!!
customer_reviews.text: This table is working perfectly as a desk for my kids virtual learning at home. It sets up and folds easily, it holds all their school tools (laptop, supply box, white board, etc.) This table is lightweight, sturdy and stores away easily. It is made of a durable material. This table is a great price for the amount of use we get from it.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Always Need More Table Space
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table for a friend who does paper crafts. We make Christmas and other cards. Her husband was getting upset that the dining room table was full of clutter, so this table works perfectly. Now that Christmas is over, he is cluttering it! [laugh] It is very sturdy and folds up easily, not that this table will probably ever see that. I would recommend this table to anyone who needs a little extra area for things. It adjusts, too. Could be good for camping, picnics, tailgating, etc.
customer_reviews.author: VLPinVA

customer_reviews.title: This Table is Great!
customer_reviews.text: Working from home has been a mixed blessing! I do not have a designate home office. I have a desktop computer set up on a very small computer desk in my dining room of all locations! After having struggled using tv trays as additional space for all the paper I have to generate I purchase this inexpensive table. It's perfect! It does't take up a lot of space and is pretty sturdy for a folding table. After we return to work this table will be used for summer cookouts and hopefully an extra table for the kids at Thansgiving!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I received COSCO Products 20" x 48" Resin Top Folding Table, Black but there was no Resin to it. This is nothing more than a cheap card table but in a different pattern. Instead of square it is rectangular. I would return it but I needed something fast for a display and when It is no longer in use I will toss it in the trash. It will never hold up to use for more than very light weight items. I am so disappointed. I really was hoping for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Good useful table
customer_reviews.text: Good useful table. I've used it to hold a mini-pool table, to play cards, and as a supplemental dinner table for cooking. It does a great job for these purposes and has a clean functional look. It isn't rock solid in terms of stability, but pretty much no folding-leg table can be as stable as a non-folding-leg table. It's fairly lightweight and easy to move from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: Santokki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome!! Very well made and sturdy to work on! The braces are strong and you have to press firmly to unhook them. Legs are braced together near the table top and fold down together. Folded it takes up less than 2" high of space (mine is under my couch). I set this up for for my sewing and crafts, and it is strong...NO wiggles! I now have an extra table room for guests. Great price too. Very pleased with this product, highly recommend it and the seller. Well packaged, fast delivery. It does have some weight to it, no lightweight fall down table here.
customer_reviews.author: Moonminx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for an office!
customer_reviews.text: This table is the perfect size for my home office, and the table top is a hard material that makes writing on its surface so easy. My tax preparer, who comes to my home, used it for his laptop; perfect! I'm thinking about purchasing the card table in this same line, or perhaps I'll just purchase another of the 20x48 tables to create a larger card table. Still debating that :-).
customer_reviews.author: multobeato

customer_reviews.title: The smell
customer_reviews.text: The bad: Extremely strong vinyl smell. After over a month it still smells. Considering buying contact paper and covering it to see if that covers the smell. The top is vinyl and soft, so not ideal for writing. The good: size and sturdy enough as a guest room table.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Received my 2 resin tables today
customer_reviews.text: The were securely and protectively wrapped for shipping and arrived in perfect condition. The tables are very strong and are stable enough. I bought them for a lightweight purpose and they more than meet expectation. Once the legs lock in place, they are locked. You need three hands to put the legs down, and my only having two, I used my head as the third hand to put the legs down. Just pushed enough with my head to get the legs out of lock position and then I used my hands to take over and put the legs down. Top, underside and legs, I'm so glad I made this purchase. If I could give these tables a 6, I would.
customer_reviews.author: I Heart Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size table for extra room during a party. I have get togethers and hate having to have a big table in my dining room for all the extra food/drinks. A normal size table is deeper and you usually lose a lot of space and it sticks out far, taking up more space in the room. This is perfect because it's only 20" deep. You can line up all your food & drink without loosing space.
customer_reviews.author: Katie004

customer_reviews.title: Very lovely multitask table !
customer_reviews.text: Love this beautiful table just fits nice in a corner of my spare room for my kids to do their home work and can even eat their food their too, a nice little multitask table !
customer_reviews.author: Rossana R. Dabreo

customer_reviews.title: Good For The Price But Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's light-weigh but I have a couple of issues with it. First of all, it's not that sturdy in my opinion. It works fine for me since I only have a Macbook Air and DJ controller on it but I would not recommend setting anything of any significant weight on it. Also, it's really difficult to fold the legs back in after use. You have to use your foot to hold it down and squeeze each side with each of your hands. It's tricky and can also be very stiff at first. Keep in mind I'm kind of a wimp but still.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay B. Feinstein

customer_reviews.title: No Center Support!!!
customer_reviews.text: ...So it sags in the middle...really badly. I'm very disappointed because this table was the perfect size for my needs! The resin top is durable and the trim surrounding it is metal. Unfortunately, the bottom of the table is "cardboard". (It looks like cardboard but is more dense than cardboard) If only there was a metal bar that ran across the bottom to support it and stop the top from sagging in the center. I considered trying to rig something myself but decided to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Perk

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The table is alright, not the best, but it gets the job done. First thing I noticed were white marks, 3 to be exact, it had been used when I was under the understanding that it was new. Second, I set it up to get an idea of the full size, when I tried to fold it back down I had difficult with one of the corners, I even had my father in law tell me the corner was messed up, and that I wasn't nuts. Easier to fold now than when I originally got it. Be careful buying this product, it can be a bitch to fold back down.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Machado

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, I like the linen finish, it looks nice
customer_reviews.text: The table is nice and looks nice, the one problem is that a screw fell out when I removed the plastic from around the table, I went to reinstall the screw and could only make it slightly snug, because the hole is slightly stripped, other than that it is a nice table and we'll worth the money from my point, it seems to be a pretty sturdy and quality, it looks very nice, I like the color and finish, I did not like the look of the black table or the adjustable table, this one I really like the looks, I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: dudis2dudis

customer_reviews.title: I love the versatility - perfect for my tiny office space in my camper!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table after taking out the bunk beds in my 27' Keystone camper so I could make the space my office. It was the only table I could find that had the correct depth (narrow) to fit the space. I put it on the long wall and put a smaller folding desk on the short wall. This gives me an L- shape desk that allows me to use a nice rolling office chair with plenty of room to maneuver. I love the folding design, adjustable height, and no bars in the way of my legs. When not working it'll double as an extra outdoor table. Very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I have another table like this in a different color
customer_reviews.text: I have another table like this in a different color. We use it when entertaining to hold extra buffet items. I use the black one as a makeshift desk, because I couldn't climb the stairs that often to get to my office. It is not an eyesore and it gets the job done. I think it would be helpful in most homes for a variety of uses.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Hegedus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Home Office
customer_reviews.text: I was able to carry this upstairs by myself and adjust the height, no problem. Basically no assembly required. Pop open the legs, adjust height, stand it up. It feels solid and comfortable height for working. For the price, you can’t beat it! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Great value on a height adjustable folding table!
customer_reviews.text: update August 2020: I've been using these tables for nearly two years now, and they have held up very well as computer tables! ******************* Update: I've hade these tables for over a year now and have used them as a desk, as crafting tables and more. Not a single problem! These make great computer tables. I'm using three with another larger table to form sort of a "C shaped" desk. The reviews mention them being too flimsy... I don't think so. I have a 42 inch monitor on one and it is fine. Not heirloom furniture, but a great deal! Not one complaint from me. I'll order more when I need to increase my work space.
customer_reviews.author: Brain_Sick_Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just got the table today and my first impression is that it's excellent for the price. It suits my needs perfectly. I've read that it can be susceptible to water damage, so I plan to be extra careful not to have any spills on it, but overall I'm very happy with it. It feels quite sturdy as well. Obviously, it's not as sturdy as a solid non-folding table, but for a folding table it's excellent in my opinion. Also, the shipping and delivery was exceptionally fast!
customer_reviews.author: DBA

customer_reviews.title: L O V E  IT!!  <3
customer_reviews.text: L O V E this table! Perfect height for a taller person. Perfect depth!! Not too wide to get around, so I can leave it up for awhile. Can adustj to sit at, or stand at. Not too bulky. Pretty light. Easily folds for storage. I can put it up and take it down easily/quickly, so it us super convenient to keep stashed for those sudden &/or back-breaking projects.
customer_reviews.author: Roxi

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, not as good as before
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple table that works fine. This has a thick plastic top instead of the older style hardboard and vinyl top. I kind of don't like it. The thicker plastic top doesn't seem any more robust than the older style, but it adds unpleasant thickness to the table that makes it harder to deal with when folded. Overall, it's sturdy enough for the price and works, but I'd rather have the old vinyl top version.
customer_reviews.author: InterTube Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Its a table
customer_reviews.text: Some of the legs aren't straight and it wobbles a lot, but its good for what i needed it for, cant really cut a steak on it without shaking everything else off of it though, its a very light table.
customer_reviews.author: Fatigue

customer_reviews.title: Great table for price
customer_reviews.text: was looking for a small table to pop up when i work on projects but not take up too much space and this did the trick! It is very sturdy and i like how the top is entirely that plastic material so it is very easy to clean if anything spills on it. It is a little hard to open and close in my opinion, but its so negligible that i wouldnt let it stop you from buying it. Great for the price point its at and it looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: sadie

customer_reviews.title: Warped top after one use
customer_reviews.text: The height, width and top I like and is what attracted me to this purchase. However after one use as a side table buffet with not much weight on it the top warped in the center. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Samantha E.

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: Well bought the wrong size in this table need wider and linger for the purpose I planned But used it in my bedroom to use my cricut cutter and accessories works great for that. All over good product
customer_reviews.author: Sampan

customer_reviews.title: Workable, but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It does if I was using it what I wanted it to do (hold two sewing machines next to each other), but is not particularly sturdy. It bows a bit in the middle from the weight of the two machines. I can sit and move between the two machines when I am working, so it isn't a big deal, but if I was using it and needed it to be level, it might be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Good small table for the cost
customer_reviews.text: These tables were fine. I bought 2 and placed them in a corner of the dining room to set up a brunch. They are very light and wobbled slightly but once they had a little weight they were fine (but I would advise against using in a high traffic area, not steady if bumped hard). As previously reviewed they are just pressed board so I cut a plastic kitchen trash bag and taped to to the tabletops under my tablecloths to prevent any liquid getting onto them, it all worked fine. Good small table for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lilian

customer_reviews.title: Serving it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: It seems quite sturdy, looks nice, in use 1 minute after removing from the box, NO ASSEMBLY! This has an urgent and temporary use and after that, will see rare duty so I'm not concerned about its use over time, though I suspect it is good enough under reasonable use to last a long time. Highly recommend for normal uses but not saw & hammer work.
customer_reviews.author: Barry A. Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy build....
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to close after opening legs. Very flimsy in integrity. Very easy to move as it is light as a feather. I wouldn't plan on putting anything heavy on this table, but it would be okay for snacks or light paperwork.
customer_reviews.author: Floydboy

customer_reviews.title: Light weight. Slightly flimsy. Good for light support
customer_reviews.text: The vinyl cover of this table is thin. Easily scratched. So I placed a sheet to protect the table cover. It does feel flimsy. But for temporary use, it is sufficient. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: feline_graduate_studentTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome. EASY PEASY set up and I just ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids outgrew their small art table. I needed a table for art, homework and eating. This is awesome. EASY PEASY set up and I just ordered another one!! Three standard stools fit under nicely!!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica E. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed with the huge crevice around the outer edge
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with the huge crevice around the outer edge. I bought this as a crafting table that would be easy to fold up and stash. It's light and very easy to store, but tiny beads, etc. fall into the crevice. So I caulked it but that was wayyyyyyyyy messier than I expected. Nonetheless, it's better than stuff disappearing into the great unknown... Just know this is a pretty cheap table.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Lame
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. I understand that you get what you pay for but this table feels like it was constructed with 3 dollars worth of materials. The “vinyl” is just a cheap leather-like material wrapped over some sort of paperboard and stapled together. Seems like a makeshift table I could construct myself. Overall, I would not recommend (and I’m not one to write reviews on here often, if ever before). ALSO, If you’re buying this table used, be prepared to possibly receive the incorrect table. I called customer service to have a replacement shipped and they weren’t even sure if I would receive the correct one the second time around..
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: EHH!
customer_reviews.text: Cardboard with sticker over it. Very light weight but wouldn't hold much I set a 10 gallon cooler in it with about 7 gallons of water in it and it gets shakey. Wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not Strong at all
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two. I collate our newsletters for our community, After about three months of using one the tables for collating -with about 500 newsletters, it was sagging in the center. And it is not easy to pull the lock levels out to slide the legs down
customer_reviews.author: LadyQ777

customer_reviews.title: Made out of cardboard
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The frame is metal and very hard to fold up. The top is made out of cardboard. Very lightweight, but it probably won't last long at all. It takes a bit of maneuvering to actually fold the legs back up. My opinion, spend more and get a better table.
customer_reviews.author: nmart

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It is not level, the legs are not of equal size
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a desk. I really just need a spot for my computer and a couple other things. The size of this is perfect. My only complaint is that it's a bit too lightweight. It's slightly wobbly. It feels less sturdy than I expected. I have a bunch of portable tables, some of plastic, some of wood, all too big for this purpose (of course!). I think some are this brand as well. They are all far more sturdy. So one star off for wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy D.

customer_reviews.title: Decent (very) lightweight table, convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Came with a chip already in it, I'm using it as a feeding table for my cat so it's not that big of a deal. Feels very flimsy. People were saying it'll hold around 110 lbs...I wouldn't trust it with more than 60 honestly. I wish there was a support in the middle because it's definitely going to bow in there. It also shakes a little whenever weight is applied to it. It's a good purchase if you just need something to fill a space and don't care how it looks or plan on putting much weight on.
customer_reviews.author: Bpf22

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for the impromptu work at home quarantine. I was worried it wouldn't be large enough, but it's perfect. Large enough for a monitor and a laptop, with writing space to spare. Easy to set up and move/store. Great for small spaces. It doesn't wobble or appear to be flimsy. Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: jan tetzlaff

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra $6 and get a Lifetime brand table ...
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra $6 and get a Lifetime brand table. The top of this table is not solid, and the edges were lifting up. Flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card Recipient

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to close once open
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table, as something that I could put up easily for special projects at home. Came yesterday; put it up last night .. and then, couldn't get the legs to fold back when I was through with it. Had to have maintenance staff close it this morning, and even they had a very difficult time getting the legs back in the folded position. Have already returned it. Find a different table; this is not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for doing homework/crafting/eating/whatever you need a little table for. I got mine as a homework station for my little apartment. I have a lot of online video lectures I prefer to watch on "the big TV" and like to spread out to take notes, and I can do that comfortably with my laptop next to me. I needed something I could fold up and slide next to my bookcase or in my closet when not in use. The price was reasonable and it's pretty sturdy for that price. I wouldn't try sitting on it or anything but the cat can jump up on it without it tipping over (at least so far).
customer_reviews.author: d3vi135

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a computer desk that I could run alongside my bed and in front of the computer and this was the incredible solution. I sit on the edge of my bed to work building models and/or working on tons of paperwork as I am an artist who designs and builds dollhouses when not oil painting for clients. There is no room for a huge desk and a big office chair as my entire bedroom is filled wall to wall with 6 gigantic miniature models that ring around my bed. I am going to get a second one so I can spread out my supplies. I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Meredithe Juliano

customer_reviews.title: Not as happy as I thought I would be with this table
customer_reviews.text: The size is okay, it doesn't sit well on the floor because it's a very lightweight table.....It's VERY difficult to fold back up; I needed a second person to help me, where I have no trouble with another heavier weight table I have......Wouldn't recommend....unless the shape and size are perfect for your needs....
customer_reviews.author: Tucson Jan

customer_reviews.title: Workplace Savers
customer_reviews.text: I have two and love using for a compact crafting area in a small bedroom. It fits my Sewing machine and overlock machine. I also use the other for jewelry crafting inside a closet in the same room. Fits great and keeps area clutter free when you can place it in closet to work from.
customer_reviews.author: I. Peacher

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: For the past several years, I have used two of these as part of a pottery display at an annual art/fine craft studio sale, and this year, I decided to purchase another one. It came early the next day, in plenty of time to set up. My display looks terrific. If I keep making pottery, I may but another one.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lees

customer_reviews.title: Table is complete garbage,
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT GET WET. and i mean even while cleaning the top. even using a spray polish is enough wetness to blow this table apart. not happy...
customer_reviews.author: Alyce

customer_reviews.title: Will do job.. for now.
customer_reviews.text: This table is doing it's job. I'm surprised that it was able to hold up my laptop and monitor with the laptop and LCD mount. You will notice however, that it's slightly wobbly. It doesn't bother me much, I knew what I was buying especially with the price I bought it for. Don't be surprised that over time it starts to deteriorate. I've had this setup now for a couple weeks and no issues with it thus far. Will continue to update this review as needed and as time goes.
customer_reviews.author: GenVicious

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, compact and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table to accommodate beverages at two different gatherings I was hosting. I love it! It is compact, yet sturdy. It held a large metal bucket/basket with ice and bottled beverages, wine, iced tea, water, sangria, cups and napkins. I also like that it has two heights--bar height and counter height.
customer_reviews.author: Oriolezgurl

customer_reviews.title: nice sturdy foldable table
customer_reviews.text: we purchased this table mainly because we have one identical to it already and wanted another for my husband to put in our spare bedroom and use as a computor, office desk. It is sturdy, easy to move or store if need be. price was very fair. came on time as promiced as well.
customer_reviews.author: jenkri2

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a table for my craft room that didn’t take up too much space and was counter height so I could work standing up. This table did the trick. It is very lightweight and slim. I haven’t used it for anything more than 2-3 pounds, but I’m sure it could hold what the description says. The adjustable height is perfect for anyone who may want to work standing or sitting.
customer_reviews.author: cpkrn2011

customer_reviews.title: I love the size of this table
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this table! It fit my needs perfectly. The package and table arrived damaged, But Amazon was super prompt in sending me a replacement. Thank you Amazon! The product is very cheaply made, so I almost gave it just three stars. However, the price is cheap, so I cannot expect a heavy duty well-made table. The top is cheap particle board, not the heavier resin of other cosco tables that i have purchased. . But for less tham $25, and being the perfect size, I am satisfied overall.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: A Little Small, Difficult to Fold, But Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality cushioned top, but difficult to fold. You have to press very hard on the metal to fold it, and I don't have the strength to do so with ease. It would be impossible for anyone with hand injuries to fold. Also a little smaller than expected, but that was my fault for not checking the measurements. Otherwise, great quality. Makes a wonderful little table setup for drinks at a party or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Carrington

customer_reviews.title: Quality is gone from what they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these tables with a manufacturer date of 2007. It is an amazing sturdy easy to fold. I bought two more tables from Amazon. Same model and size. Both new ones were total pieces of crap. Super hard to fold, wouldn’t set flat on the floor, quality was totally gone compared to my old table. First time I’ve ever left a bad review.
customer_reviews.author: Olehippie

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Versatile Folding Table
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little folding table. I have borrowed my parents' mini folding table several times over the past couple of years and I've added and removed this table to my Amazon cart many times. I finally decided to purchase one of my own and I'm so glad I did. This table is perfect for outdoor cooking when glamping and we use it at every party we host as a "party favor" table. It's such a versatile table! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley K

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Makes for Easy Transport
customer_reviews.text: Is a decent folding table for an okay price point. I got this one because I could not get another more compact table in the same time frame I needed it. The vinyl is more delicate than I expected, so really have to be careful not to ruin it. Its light weight, which is nice for transportation, which is a major upside since you have to carry the item lengthwise, if you are lugging it around. Will give an update on durability at later date (plan on using for tailgating events), as I have only unboxed this item.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very handy little table
customer_reviews.text: Very handy. Not too wide - I was able to put this (set up and extended) behind a bedroom door without it interfering with door opening and closing, which makes me very happy. It’s a couple feet tall and seems rather sturdy. I have a 5 foot tall dollhouse on it. Nice to reclaim the floor space under it too. I also purchased one for work and it makes a great desk extension for printer and file folders.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa522

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Been working form home during quarantine and needed a long table that can easily be put away. This works great for what i need it for, but its definitely not a heavy use type of table. Works great for my monitors and laptop to pull up to my couch but I wouldn't use it for much more or for long term.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Perry

customer_reviews.title: This product is sub par
customer_reviews.text: You might have added that “light outside use” meant that this wasn’t waterproof! Who uses a “sturdy” frame with painted cardboard?!? We had a rain storm last night and woke up to a table with a puddle! We didn’t realize it wasn’t able to be left in the rain. I’m not going to go through the trouble of packing it up and sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Pewtress

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly legs
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the legs are a bit wobbly. I needed extra space in my office just to be able to spread out a bit. I'm using this for paperwork only, nothing heavy for fear of it collapsing. I won't be purchasing it again sorry to say.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Durable and works for both indoors and out.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table initially for my laundry room to fold clothes. The fact that it's foldable and relatively easy to move around, makes this a great table for any sort of extra space. It's been used for parties to hold food and drinks, outside to help with potting plants. Overall very easy to clean and store. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT in sewing room
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect in my sewing room as a cutting table. No need to bend over to cut!! Easy to fold up and put away when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: M.C Davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazed at durability!
customer_reviews.text: Amazed at this table! I bought it to set my hedgehog cage on which is 4ft long, and true to its word this table is 4ft long. It’s sturdy, durable... I absolutely love it. It folds down easily and unfolds easy. I am truly amazed at how durable it is for being so lightweight .. good product right here!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ashley Wightman

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table for a temporary computer desk at the insistence of a family member, it is barely suitable, it is shaky. While in the future I might be able to use if for very light needs , I would not purchase again nor would I recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn laughter

customer_reviews.title: A classic. A-plus.
customer_reviews.text: So, I was looking around for one of those old-fashioned steel typewriter tables and found they are now selling for hundreds of dollars on E-bay. That's not what this is but it reminds me of that: utilitarian, but just like in the picture, you could work it into a well-planned decor. It fits where I put it, and I like it every time I walk by.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built table but hard to open and close the legs. Must put a lot of pressure on the release tabs. Would be very difficult for people with hand strength problems.
customer_reviews.author: G. Magno

customer_reviews.title: This was very good
customer_reviews.text: This table was very good, it held strong when objects are placed on it and is easily transportable!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: I use this table for sewing, playing cards, minor construction projects, etc.. The height is easy to adjust. Be alert when purchasing, the product has three different tables so read carefully when making your selection, only one is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seemed great
customer_reviews.text: Seemed great but one month in and the side of the top has cracked and split from the top
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: Needed a new work table.
customer_reviews.text: This table suites my needs for building new systems. Vinyl cover, tan in color, goes with any décor. 49" long and 20" wide. Legs have covers on the bottom. Fairly sturdy. Can set a empty case on one side, work on the other. 5 systems sit underneath.
customer_reviews.author: PC Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Super narrow and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this was the narrow "desk" i was looking for!! I'm working from my room right now and needed something super narrow and long to set my desktop station (2 large 27" monitors). It was the best purchase of the month!!! Loved it!! It may be "flimsy" as others complain but as long as you're not setting 20 heavy objects on it, you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah V.

customer_reviews.title: "traditional" not a molded resin top and had some rust on metal edge of table top.
customer_reviews.text: The listing had 3 options for the 20" by 48" folding table. We chose the "traditional" option that said resin table top. The video included with the pictures shows a molded resin top table, but what we received was a cardboard backed plastic or vinyl covered tabletop with a metal edge. Not only was it not the molded resin top, but there was areas of light rust on the metal edge of the table top! (Add said good for light outdoor use!!) Returned item for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, lightweight, perfect
customer_reviews.text: This table is amazing, especially for the price. A lot of reviewers mention using it for BBQs or temporary outdoor uses (which, going by their reviews, it's also great for), but I needed an affordable work desk for sculpting, and this one is perfect. It's sturdy, it doesn't wobble, it's incredibly lightweight, the surface is hard and flat. Overall wonderful product, I'm more than satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: False description, not PVC top as described!
customer_reviews.text: I received a very heavy table with a paperboard top. Definitely not PVC. I was looking for something that would hold up inside or occasional outdoor use in FL where it rains every afternoon practically. Immediately returning.
customer_reviews.author: socialnance

customer_reviews.title: Scratches
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table, perfect size, hard surface for writing, folds & fits behind door when not in use but there were several scratches on top that had to have been there before packaging because it was packed great & there were no rips in the box. Kind of a bummer to know someone thought it was ok to send out with blemishes:(
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Wobbles
customer_reviews.text: The table is not level. I'm old hat at fold outs and I love them. Never have I had one that is this rickety. Also the table top is separated from the base at the corners. I returned it and I don't think I want to buy another from a company who can't quality control.
customer_reviews.author: InfiniTea

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: The table came on time and in an easy to open box. I was able to set it up myself and I am disabled. Looks really nice, I'm using it as a cosmetic table. Fit perfectly in the spot I chose and is sturdy and looks very durable. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Gail Harder

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly narrow
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a narrow table to fit inside of a closet in my office, so that I could store some storage bins underneath it, but keep things like my printer and shredder on top. Found this table and it's perfect. I was able to slide it into the closet and then unfold it into place. Fits my needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good surface but wobbly.
customer_reviews.text: Its wobbly. I wouldn't trust it to hold something expensive. The padded surface does retain impression marks if you sit something heavy on it. But its a great photography surface. Or if you needed a extra table for game playing or seating for dinner it would be great for that. It's light and folds/unfolds easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and useful
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and easy to set up. Have used it twice for parties and so far holds up very well. Easy to take down and store. Handy for holding ice and soda and drinks as not too large to get in the way of the dining. Will see how it holds up but so far very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: WiseLobo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for inside use, don’t leave outside
customer_reviews.text: This would be a 5 star table if the top was made of a different material. If you intend to use it inside only, it’s fantastic. I bought it for outside, and the humidity is warping the top. If you are willing to bring it in each night than its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for my new working from home setup. It holds and fits my laptop, 24” monitor, mouse, keyboard and notepads, along with other things. It also came already assembled and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Syedur

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons room to hold a small microwave and mini fridge had to throw out after first semester didn’t hold up well and top is made of fabric which ripped
customer_reviews.author: Christina McCloskey

product_meta.title: COSCO Products 20" x 48" Resin Top Folding Table, Black
product_meta.description: Style:Resin| Color:BlackUnfold some fun with a versatile table designed for indoor or light outdoor use. This table is stylish, strong and easy to clean. This versatile piece saves space and time with table legs that fold in to make for easy storage. This table has a heavy duty steel frame and steel legs.
feature_bullets: FLEXIBLE - Resin top allows for indoor and light outdoor use
NON-MARRING - Let tips protect floor surfaces
FOLDS FLAT - Just 1.5 Inch wide for easy storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,245 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
